headline: UBS Reduces the Firm’s PT on Kimberly-Clark (KMB) Stock
summary: Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NASDAQ:KMB) is one of the Best Depressed Stocks to Buy Right Now. On January 14, UBS reduced the firm’s price objective on Kimberly-Clark Corporation (NASDAQ:KMB)’s stock to $107 from $132, while keeping a “Neutral” rating, as reported by The Fly. The analyst stated that the operating environment and market backdrop for consumer staples are challenging. That being […]
